name: Carvester
description:
Farmer Hubert has unexpectedly passed away, and his next of kin need his fields harvested. The thing is, they're not farmers. They don't care about the quality of the job, they just need it harvested as fast as possible so they can forget about it. Hubert's finicky old tractor isn't gonna cut it, so your only option is to rent yourself a racecar, tie a combine harvester to the back, and pray. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Accelerate forward and backward with W and S

Turn left and right with A and D

Run the harvester into crops or power-ups to harvest them

Don't let the harvester hit the cows, or you'll lose

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

By Roosevelt, Si, and Quam
